title: Simulation-Based Collaborative Competency Assessment and Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with basic simulation tools and foundational understanding of social issues
context.additional_context: Completed setup of a real-time location tracking and behavior analysis data collection environment using digital devices.

learning_goals: Students can accurately evaluate team collaboration efficiency by analyzing spatial movement patterns in a simulation environment with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can propose three or more strategies to improve their work processes based on location data analysis results.
Participants can write reports explaining the correlation between spatial behavioral characteristics and team performance during simulation tasks.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
